features: 【SPACE SAVING】: Our 5 wood floating shelves for wall provide different sizes of storage space, allowing you to efficiently utilize space on wall. You can place picture frames, small plants or decorations on a wood shelf to organize your home space. Wall mounted shelves lip will prevent items from falling off.

【UNIQUE DECORATION FOR ROOM】: Rustic wood shelves provide a classic and wood look to make your home stylish. You can also hang them to display your items. The classic U-shape ledge design shelves are for bedroom, living room, bathroom, kitchen, office and varieties of home style spaces.
【STURDY FLOATING SHELVES】: 16-inch wood floating shelves are made of wood and they come slightly different in color and grain. Each floating shelf is unique.

【EASY TO INSTALL】: Wooden wall mounted shelves for storage have pre-drilled holes, easily comprehensible instructions and all necessary mounting hardware, which makes installation simple and easy in a few minutes.

【VALUE FOR MONEY】: Upsimples Home wood shelves set of 5 in different sizes are a great addition to any space and a set can meet all the space needs of the home. Let's decorate your home together and your cat will love it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT! Renter-friendly, easy to install, holds decent weight!
reviews.reviewText: First, I am a 5'1 girl with near zero experience with hanging, installing, constructing, etc. I managed to get all the shelves up and decorated in about an hour and a half, including a 20-minute break to call my brother to ensure I was doing it right.These were SUPER easy to install. The only tool of my own that I needed was a screwdriver. I have drywall walls, so I did not need much to get everything into the wall. If you have concrete, brick, etc., the instructions recommend having a drill for your initial hole and a hammer to put in the anchor. They come with all the screws you need, all the anchors (both types), a mini level, instructions, and extra screws and anchors. All I did to install these was mark the holes with a pencil, make a small hole there with my screwdriver, and then push the anchor in, screw it into place, and screwdrive the shelve into the anchor. So easy that even I (a mechanical idiot) could do it.Second, as you can see from the pictures, I don't have anything super heavy on them, but some items have weight. I am not sure of an exact number, but I would say that 5 pounds is no problem at all. 10 pounds would probably be fine. More than that, I cannot speak to. For regular office shelves, they are perfect. Other reviewers put these shelves in their bathrooms, and they seemed to do well. As for book shelving, I'm not sure they are the best due to the depth of the shelves more than the weight. But so far, I have loved them for brightening up my office!Third, I think these are great renter-friendly items! I took a picture of the little holes that I had to make in the wall in order to assemble these. With some plaster or joint compound and a bit of paint, these would be easily concealed in no time! They are also super easy to take down! I had one a little misplaced and easily took it out and was able to conceal the old hole behind the shelf that can be covered up when I move out.Overall, I would say1. Worth the time to put them up. They took about an hour to install, and like I said, I am not the handiest person.2. Worth the money spent. These are decent quality and have held up against me dropping stuff or knocking into them. Only time will tell how long they last, but so far so good!3. Worth the holes in the wall. I think this was most important for me as a renter. I didn't want to put any huge holes in the wall, because I wouldn't know how to repair something like that. I also didn't want to put them up and hate them, but fortunately, they are super cute!I think these are great for anyone, experienced or not, who wants to spruce up a space with a little decor. These shelves are easy to install and uninstall. They are not super expensive. And they are very cute and easy to decorate! Worth the time and money, would definitely recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These shelves are perfect for any room
reviews.reviewText: They are very well built, sturdy and easy to install We added these to our camper to place cell phones beside the bed and a lot of other small items They are very beautiful shelves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shelves, but use your own hardware
reviews.reviewText: These shelves look very elegant and give an upscale impression even though they were pretty inexpensive. I combined them with some thrifted artwork, artificial plants, battery operated candles, etc. and made a pretty gallery wall for my bedroom.The front edge keeps your decor from sliding off which works well for picture frames or propped up decor. If you wanted to, you could also mount the shelves upside down for a smooth top surface.The package includes a level which was handy, but the anchors aren’t great. I struggled to install the shelves until I used my own hardware, and after that it was smooth sailing. Do yourself a favor and buy your own anchors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional Wall Decor Storage Solution
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Upsimples Home Floating Shelves, and they have been an absolute game-changer for my home decor and storage needs!First and foremost, the set of five shelves offers incredible versatility. I've used them in various rooms throughout my house, including the bedroom, living room, bathroom, and kitchen. They fit seamlessly into any space, instantly elevating the overall aesthetics.The rich brown color of the shelves complements my decor perfectly, adding a touch of warmth and elegance to the surroundings. The wood material used is of high quality, making the shelves sturdy and reliable for displaying a variety of items.Installation was a breeze! The mounting hardware and instructions provided made the process quick and straightforward. The floating design gives the shelves a sleek and modern look while maximizing space utilization.I love using these shelves to display small picture frames, decorative items, and even some potted plants. They add a personal touch to my living spaces, allowing me to showcase cherished memories and decorative pieces with ease.In the kitchen, I've utilized the shelves to store spices, small jars, and kitchen essentials, keeping my countertops clutter-free and organized.Furthermore, the shelves are easy to clean and maintain, which is an added bonus for busy homeowners like myself.The Upsimples Home Floating Shelves have truly transformed my home, providing both a functional storage solution and a stylish way to display my favorite items. I highly recommend these shelves to anyone looking to spruce up their living spaces with a touch of elegance and organization!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful color
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, took about 5 minutes. Most difficult part was where to place them. I placed picture frames and little things collected that I didn't want on a dresser. Only con is the smallest shelf is so small that I'm not sure what I can place on it. I'll try a smaller picture frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These come exactly as presented and are of good quality for the price. They look great on the wall. I used mine for smart home electronics (hubs, router, power and much more. There was a perfect size for everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good shelves, poor mounting hardware
reviews.reviewText: The wood shelves are nice and look identical to what’s in the product listing.The wall anchors for drywall are cheap and not very good.The white anchors in the pictures came with the shelves. They are missing a rim or flange at the opening. Because of this they have a tendency to be pushed past the hole and into the space behind the drywall.I ended up using the blue wall anchors that I bought from Home Depot instead to mount the shelves.The brick/cinder block anchors looked ok, but I did not use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just moved into a smaller place and the bathroom is quite small. I use these shelves as storage for my hair products and face products. They are a great size and can fit a lot on them. the packaging was good. The instructions were simple and it came with a cute leveler, but it is not sturdy, so get a leveler that has a flat side. Besides that, I have had no problems!
